snippet: Judges in the trial of former President Hosni Mubarak on Tuesday scheduled a full month for his defense team to make its case.
abstract: Judges in trial of former Egyptian Pres Hosni Mubarak schedule a full month for his defense team to make its case, meaning any verdict will come after one-year anniversary of uprisings that ended his rule.
lead_paragraph: Judges in the trial of former President Hosni Mubarak on Tuesday scheduled a full month for his defense team to make its case.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
